required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluating of the Safety, Pharmacokinetics and Pharmacodynamics of QL1205 and Lucentis® in Patients With Wet AMD
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Double-blind, Two-group Parallel, Positive-controlled Clinical Phase I Trial Comparing the Safety, Pharmacokinetics and Pharmacodynamics of QL1205 and Lucentis® in Patients With Wet Age-related Macular Degeneration.

brief_summary.textblock: This is a randomized, double-blind, two-group parallel, positive-controlled clinical Phase I trial comparing the safety, pharmacokinetics and pharmacodynamics of QL1205 and Lucentis® in patients with wet age-related macular degeneration.

detailed_description.textblock:
This is a phase I, randomized, double-blind, two-group parallel, positive-controlled clinical trial at four centers.
The primary objective is to assess the initial clinical safety of intravitreal injection of QL1205 or Lucentis® in patients with wet age-related macular degeneration (wet-AMD).
The secondary objective are to assess the initial clinical effectiveness and pharmacokinetic characteristics of intravitreal injection of QL1205 or Lucentis® in patients with wet age-related macular degeneration (wet-AMD).
Subjects would sequentially enrolled according to the protocol in one of two cohorts.Subjects would receive a single 0.5mg of QL1205 or Lucentis® once a month for three months through vitreous injection.

primary_outcome.measure: To evaluate the safety of QL1205
primary_outcome.description: To evaluate the safety of QL1205, compared to that of Lucentis (registered trademark) in patients with neovascular AMD.This will be done by assessment of vital signs, physical examination, laboratory blood tests and adverse events.

arm_group.description: QL1205 injection (0.5mg) by vitreous injection once a month for three months（D1、D29、D57）
Lucentis® injection(0.5mg) by vitreous injection once a month for three months（D1、D29、D57）

intervention.description: intravitreal injection of 0.5 mg (0.05 ml), Q4W, continuous administration for 3 times (D1, D29, D57)
intravitreal injection of 0.5 mg (0.05 ml), Q4W, continuous administration for 3 times (D1, D29, D57)

overall_official.affiliation: Shanghai General Hospital, Shanghai Jiao Tong University School of Medicine

facility.name: Shanghai General Hospital, Shanghai Jiao Tong University School of Medicine
